subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The freshman Derrick Rose had 17 points, 6 rebounds and 5 assists in his collegiate debut and No. 3 Memphis beat visiting Tennessee-Martin, 102-71, in the 2K Sports College Hoops Classic.Chris Douglas Roberts tied his career high with 28 points and had 8 rebounds for Memphis (1-0). Lester Hudson scored 35 points for Tennessee-Martin.
